text: Jason Scott Merrells (born 9 March 1968) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the roles of Matt Hawley in the BBC medical drama series Casualty (1994–1997), Gavin Ferraday in the BBC hairdressing drama series Cutting It (2002–2005), Jack Rimmer in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2006–2008, 2025), and Declan Macey in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (2010–2014). More recently, he has portrayed Sir Charles Fraith in the comedy-drama series Agatha Raisin (2016–present). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Essex
title: Jason Merrells
